readable.title: 948196883_e190a483b1
readable.content: A man is asleep on the ground near two bank machines . A man is slouched near an ATM while another man is withdrawing money from a different ATM . A man sits in front of an ATM machine while another man uses the machine . a man with a brwon jacket on his shoulders lying on the sidewalk near two ATM machines . There is a man using an ATM machine , while a man sleeps on the ground next to him .
